title: Rebellion
description: “Don’t you want this Sophie? Don't you want me to touch you? To make love to you, over and over again?” his lips make a trail from my neck to my shoulder. “Isn't it enough?” David Preston came into Sophie's life and changed it in ways she could never have anticipated. Now the intensely sexy, exquisitely beautiful man is hers, or is he really?
author: Serena Grey
